Michael Bacall

availability.p: Educational use only. Encoded for academic analysis.

bibl.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World Shooting Script
bibl.note: Scene 64 and 65: Lucas Lee Fight Sequence

projectDesc.p: This project aims to explore the narrative structure, character interactions, and transmedia connections in the film adaptation of Scott Pilgrim vs. the World through semantic encoding and network analysis.

editorialDecl.p: The text has been encoded maintaining the original screenplay format. Character names, stage directions, and dialogue have been structurally distinguished. Entities such as characters and locations have been linked to an external Knowledge Graph using 'sameAs' and 'ref' attributes.

div.head: EXT. CASA LOMA - CONTINUOUS
div.stage: A crew readies a shot of WINIFRED HAILEY held hostage by some GOON. A STAND IN takes the place of the leading man. Scott and Ramona approach some SPECTATORS, including Wallace.

sp.speaker: RAMONA
sp.p: Did you find the guy you’re stalking?

sp.speaker: WALLACE
sp.p: I think I’m about to right now.

div.stage: The UNIVERSAL STUDIOS FANFARE announces LUCAS LEE as he exits his trailer, smoking a cigarette (blacked out). He skates towards the set, doing kickflips. The spectators go ’oooh’.

sp.speaker: WALLACE
sp.p: I want to have his adopted babies.

sp.speaker: RAMONA
sp.p: I used to date that clown.

sp.speaker: RAMONA
sp.p: Wallace. I am not a slut.

sp.speaker: WALLACE
sp.p: I can think of no higher accolade.

div.stage: Lucas steps to his mark and puffs up into action hero mode.
Lucas Lee points his board at the GOON.

sp.speaker: LUCAS LEE
sp.p: Hey. The only thing keeping me and her apart is the two minutes it’s gonna take to kick your ass.

sp.speaker: RAMONA
sp.p: In 9th grade. We had drama. Actually, it might have been math. I just remember there being lots of drama.

div.stage: Lucas Lee points at Scott, who remains oblivious.

sp.speaker: RAMONA
sp.p: He just followed me around. He was a little snot nosed brat.

sp.speaker: SCOTT
sp.p: He had snot? In his nose? But he’s famous!

sp.speaker: RAMONA
sp.p: It’s not a big deal. I only dated him for a week and a half

sp.speaker: LUCAS LEE
sp.p: I’m talking to you Scott Pilgrim!

div.stage: Lucas Lee stomps towards Scott, who gasps.

sp.speaker: SCOTT
sp.p: He’s famous and he talked to me!

sp.speaker: LUCAS LEE
sp.p: The only thing keeping me and her apart is the two minutes it’s gonna take to kick your ass!

div.stage: POW! Lucas Lee punches Scott, flooring him. Scott comes back up with a pen and paper, wobbly.
POW! Lucas Lee PUNCHES Scott again. He nods to Ramona.

sp.speaker: LUCAS LEE
sp.p: Sup. How’s life? He seems nice.

div.stage: Lucas Lee THROWS Scott up into a castle turret, crumbling it. Scott CRASHES down through scaffolding onto the set. Lucas holds up his hands for a quick continuity photo, then stomps over to pick up a dazed Scott from the ground.
